Elements.Various.UISelectFromModelOnDemandInline

string   value                                       id of selected variant
array    [variants = []]                             list of variants
boolean  [loaded = false]                            true if we already loaded variants from server via API
string   [placeholder = "empty select item"]         placeholder title
string   [fieldname = "selectFromModel"]             this input fieldname
string   [modelName = ""]                            API modelName
string   [actionName = ""]                           API actionName
object   [actionFilter = {}]                         API filtering rules
object   [actionSorter = {}]                         API sorting rules
object   [actionPager = {}]                          API pager state
object   [actionSearch = undefined]                  API search string
string   [optionId = ":_id"]                         variant object id field name
string   [optionTitle = ":title"]                    variant object title field name
boolean  [required = false]                          field is required
boolean  [readonly = false]                          field is reaonly      
number   [size]                                      size of select
boolean  [valid = true]                              field is valid
function [onreject = () => false]                    callback on reject of selection process
function [onresolve = () => true]                    callback on resolve of selection process
function [onerror = () => true]                      callback on error
